displayName.english: Straight to the heart, and you're to blame!
Say hello to my little friend
An answer for every shot you took
Good things come in small packages

description.english: 1000 Frags with the single MK23 Pistol

displayName.english: Are you crazy?! You could have killed me!
I'm getting a little tired of chopping you up
I fear you're underestimating the sneakiness, sir

description.english: 1000 Frags while wearing the Kevlar Vest
1000 Frags while wearing the Kevlar Helmet

displayName.english: Time to retire, there's nothing left to accomplish

description.english: 25 Frags via slashing knife to the jugular

displayName.english: But you ain't got no legs!
You just can't go around killing people!
I think they ticked off the wrong person
You tell him I'm comin', and Hell's comin' with me!
One of these things is not like the other ...

description.english: Get a grenade frag while using a silencer
Get fragged by a laser beam
Get fragged by melting in slime
Go for a swim in some lava
100 headshot frags with a single MK23 Pistol
10000 Frags with each main weapon type
1000 Frags total from Kicks and Punches
Compete in a 3 Team match in map 'asylum'
Get a frag exactly 69 seconds in a match

displayName.english: Wrong place at the wrong time

description.english: Get fragged at exactly 1000 seconds in a match
Score exactly 69 frags in a match

displayName.english: You remember when I said I'd kill you last..?  I lied.

description.english: 100 frags total from the first 3 seconds of a round

displayName.english: Well that didn't take long at all, did it?
...and to hear the lamentation of their women
I love it when a plan comes together
The CIA got you pushing too many pencils?
The enemy of my enemy is my enemy

description.english: Deal more than 10000 damage in a single match
Have more than 3 frags per minute with a score of 30 or more
Maintain an accuracy of over 50% in a single match with a minimum of 25 shots
Record a headshot frag streak of more than 5
Land at least 100 hits in a single match
Record a single frag from a single shot in a match and nothing else
Have twice as many deaths than frags in a single match
Record exactly the same amount of frags and deaths in a single match (minimum 5)
Record over 1000 shots in a single match
Record at least 5 frags and never die in a Matchmode game
Record over 1500 shots in a single match
Maintain a damage/shot ratio of over 200 in a single match with a minimum 25 shots
Maintain a damage/shot ratio of over 300 in a single match with a minimum 25 shots
